item.title: Find the kth Node from the Back
item.description: Here is the link to the problem: kth node from Back. Problem Statement with Though Process: We need to find the kth node from the back of the linked list. Imagine your four finger, where index finger is P1 and pinky finger is P2. To find 4th node from back, we place our hand at the end of the linked list, the index finger points to the 4th node from back.
